can-switch-wallet-any-time: Anda dapat beralih di antara beberapa akun setiap saat.
error-too-small-bet: Tidak bisa membuat taruhan sebesar {{@sum}}, taruhan minimum untuk mata uang {{@currency}} adalah {{@minbet}}
error-too-big-bet: Tidak bisa membuat taruhan sebesar {{@sum}}, taruhan maksimum untuk mata uang {{@currency}} adalah {{@maxbet}}
not-enough-money: Dana di akun Anda tidak mencukupi.
tournament-winning-rules: Trader dengan saldo terbanyak pada akhir turnamen akan menjadi pemenang.
unsupported-browser: Produk ada dalam tahap pengujian, saat ini kami menjamin operasi yang stabil di peramban ini: Google Chrome, Opera and Yandex Browser. Terima kasih atas pengertian Anda!
tournaments-current-is-empty: Tidak ada kontes aktif. Ikuti umpan berita kami dan nantikan buletin.
tournaments-future-is-empty: Tidak ada jadwal kontes mendatang. Ikuti umpan berita kami dan nantikan buletin.

9ff3fdc4-b214-49db-8718-39c315e33d45: Nilai ini terlalu pendek. Nilainya harus mengandung {{@min}} karakter atau lebih.
d94b19cc-114f-4f44-9cc4-4138e80a87b9: Nilai ini terlalu panjang. Nilainya harus mengandung {{@limit}} karakter atau kurang.

296ea5496bee3177c83ac27a1dc5bb10: Saldo kontes harus lebih kecil daripada saldo awal
0f8e85ca21aa2e33752728cf5e843e35: Anda telah melampaui batas jumah investasi yang tersedia
cbce1334c90e82f44381abe99b98fe5c: Jumlah total dari opsi batasan terbuka telah terlampaui
23bd9dbf-6b9b-41cd-a99e-4844bcf3077f: Nama panggilan ini telah digunakan. Pilih nama yang lain.
promos-is-empty: No current promotions available. Please follow our latest news and watch out for future emails.
first-launch-disclaimer-content: Perhatian! Hanya Satu Kali Klik untuk membuka perdagangan. Tanpa konfirmasi.
trading-session-closed-info-1: Pasar saham tutup pada akhir pekan.
trading-session-closed-info-2: Trading di platform kami tersedia mulai pukul 03.00 hari Senin hingga pukul 00.00 hari Jumat.
trading-session-closed-info-3: Data pasar disediakan oleh Thompson Reuters.
fill-profile-to-continue: Untuk melanjutkan pekerjaan Anda di platform, harap berikan informasi tambahan
fill-username-text: Untuk bergabung dalam turnanamen, masukkan nama panggilan yang akan merepresentasikan Anda dalam daftar peserta turnamen. Anda dapat mengubahnya di pengaturan profil kapan saja.
received-bonus: Beserta deposit yang dipilih, Anda akan menerima
cannot-buy-option-try-later: Tidak dapat membuka perdagangan ini, coba lagi nanti.
notifications$demo-option-limit: Ingin membuka lebih dari 5 perdagangan sekaligus? Buka akun riil. Untuk melanjutkan penggunaan akun demo, tunggu sampai perdagangan selesai
max-total-bet-limit-exceeded:
Anda telah melampaui jumlah perdagangan yang diizinkan.
 Jumlah perdagangan yang diizinkan {{@maxBet}}
hint-activate-tment-wallet: Tekan di sini untuk mulai menggunakan akun kontes
banner-tech-works-info-content:
Kami selalu berupaya memperbaiki platform trading kami.
 Saat ini, platform sedang diperbarui.
 Kami mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanannya.
confirm-email-content: Konfirmasikan alamat surel Anda. Klik tombol berikut untuk mengirimkan ulang surel dengan tautan konfirmasi.
banner-not-enough-funds-for-tment: Dana di akun Anda tidak mencukupi. Isi ulang dana di akun Anda untuk mengikuti kontes.
tment-reenter-not-allowed: Anda tidak dapat melakukan pembelian tambahan jika masih ada transaksi terbuka.
wrong-promocode-max-sum: Maximum amount to activate promo code {{@sum}}
wrong-promocode-min-sum: Minimum amount to activate promo code {{@sum}}
wrong-promocode-only-for-second-deposit: Tersedia hanya untuk deposit kedua dan berikutnya
please-rotate-device: Putar perangkat agar Anda dapat menggunakan terminal dengan mudah.
swipe-up-to-enter-fs: Usap ke atas untuk masuk ke mode layar penuh
click-to-enter-fs: Ketuk sembarang tempat pada layar untuk beralih ke mode layar penuh
reg-request-message: Jika Anda trading di situs web kami, Anda bisa menghasilkan {{@income}} saat ini. Jangan sia-siakan waktu lagi, mulai trading!
trade-without-restrictions-message: Jika Anda ingin membuka lebih dari 5 perdagangan, buka akun trading riil dan trading tanpa batas. Untuk tetap menggunakan akun demo, harap tunggu penawaran Anda saat ini berakhir.
error-sending-email-confirmation: Terjadi kesalahan saat mengirimkan surel. Coba lagi nanti.
error-sending-email-confirmation-with-ti: Surel baru dapat dikirimkan kepada Anda dalam waktu {@time}} menit. Untuk mengaktifkan akun Anda, periksa surel Anda atau hubungi layanan dukungan kami.
deposit-using-agreements-p1: Bonus adalah dana tambahan yang disediakan oleh perusahaan untuk meningkatkan potensi trading para trader.
deposit-using-agreements-p2: Saat melakukan deposit, jumlah uang bonus tertentu dapat dikreditkan ke akun Anda, besaran bonus tergantung pada besaran deposit Anda.
deposit-using-agreements-p3: Bonus tidak membatasi jumlah dana yang bisa Anda tarik: Anda bisa menarik profit beserta dana deposit Anda kapan saja. Harap diperhatikan bahwa saat menarik dana, semua dana bonus diterima di muka akan diubah ke statusnya menjadi tidak aktif dan akan didebit dari akun Anda.
deposit-user-sum-value-caption: Ingin mengambil uang Anda? Gunakan kolom masukan
cashbox-withdrawal-info-0-header: Bagaimana cara menarik dana dari akun saya?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-0-content: Opsi yang tersedia adalah: kartu bank, dompet-el Qiwi/Yandex Money/WebMoney. Pemilik akun mikro dapat memiliki satu permohonan penarikan dana yang aktif.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-1-header: Berapakah jumlah minimum uang yang dapat ditarik dari akun?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-1-content: Jumlah penarikan minimum — ₽300 atau $5 atau €5 atau A$5 atau ₴150. Jumlah penarikan maksimum dalam satu transaksi — ₽15.000 atau $200 atau €200 atau A$200 atau ₴6.000.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-2-header: Bagaimana cara menarik uang yang lebih besar dari ₽15.000 atau $200 atau €200 atau A$200, atau ₴6.000?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-2-content: Pembatasan ini ditetapkan untuk mencegah penarikan akun secara cepat. Jumlah yang melampaui batas yang ditetapkan hanya dapat ditarik dalam jangka waktu yang lebih lama. Jika Anda perlu menarik dalam jumlah besar, Anda dapat memecah penarikan dana Anda dalam nominal $200 atau €200 atau A$200, atau tambahan ₽15.000 atau ₴6.000. Jumlah permintaan penarikan yang dapat dilakukan tidak dibatasi. Jika Anda ingin melakukan penarikan yang lebih besar dalam satu pembayaran, hubungi tim dukungan platform. Jika akun Anda tidak terverifikasi, mungkin diperlukan waktu hingga tiga hari kerja untuk memproses permintaan penarikan dana. Anda tidak dapat mengajukan lebih dari satu permintaan penarikan dana per hari.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-3-content-a: Diperlukan waktu satu jam untuk memproses permintaan, dengan asumsi bahwa permintaan tersebut diajukan selama jam kerja departemen keuangan di platform dan akun Anda telah diverifikasi sesuai dengan persyaratan platform.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-3-content-b: Jam kerja departemen keuangan adalah hari Senin hingga Jumat pukul 10.00 hingga 22.00 (GMT +2). Jika Anda mengajukan permintaan penarikan dana di luar jam kerja departemen keuangan atau pada hari libur, maka permintaan Anda akan diproses pada awal hari kerja berikutnya. Jika akun Anda belum diverifikasi, maka permintaan penarikan dana Anda akan diproses dalam waktu tiga hari kerja. Anda tidak dapat mengirimkan lebih dari satu permintaan penarikan dana per hari.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-4-content-a: Klien harus melengkapi semua data yang diminta pada bagian "Pengaturan Profil" untuk memastikan bahwa permintaan mereka telah diproses sebagaimana mestinya. Jika ditemukan data yang dimasukkan tidak akurat atau tidak lengkap, permintaan penarikan dana Anda dapat ditolak atau ditunda.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-4-content-b: Dana ditarik ke rekening bank yang sama (atau sistem pembayaran yang sama) yang digunakan untuk mendanai akun Anda. Jika tidak memungkinkan untuk menyelesaikan transaksi, maka Anda harus menghubungi layanan dukungan baik dengan cara memulai obrolan daring atau mengirimkan permintaan dukungan ke support@binarium.com.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-5-header: Apakah saya harus menyediakan dokumen saat menarik dana? Jika ya, dokumen apa saja?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-5-content-a: Harap lengkapi semua data pribadi Anda pada bagian "Pengaturan Profil" untuk memastikan penarikan yang cepat. Jika Anda menggunakan beberapa kartu bank atau detail pembayaran yang tidak cocok dengan data pribadi yang telah Anda berikan saat pendaftaran, Anda perlu menjalani seluruh proses otorisasi dan membuktikan bahwa kartu tersebut benar-benar milik Anda. Dana mungkin tidak dapat ditarik ke akun pihak ketiga.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-5-content-b: Untuk menyelesaikan proses verifikasi, berikan salinan paspor dan bagian depan kartu bank Anda yang dipindai ke support@binarium.com sehingga nama depan dan belakang pemilik dapat terlihat. Jika kartu yang Anda miliki bukan kartu yang dicetak timbul, maka Anda harus mengirimkan salinan laporan bank yang dipindai yang menampilkan suatu transaksi dari kartu ini ke akun Binarium Anda serta salinan paspor Anda. Perusahaan berhak untuk meminta dokumen pendukung tambahan jika data pemilik kartu dan akun trading tidak cocok.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-header: Pada keadaan apa penarikan dana bonus memungkinkan?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-content-a: Bonus itu sediri tidak dapat segera ditarik setelah ditambahkan. Pialang mengkreditkan uang ini pada akun Anda sebagai bonus untuk meningkatkan peluang trading Anda. Bunga yang Anda dapatkan dari hasil dari penggunakan dana bonus juga merupakan sebuah bonus, dan hanya tersedia untuk ditarik setelah omset perdagangan yang diperlukan tercapai. Untuk menarik bonus itu sendiri, Anda harus mencapai omset x40 dari jumlah bonus di akun. Jika Anda diberi bonus tanpa deposit, maka leverage dinaikkan menjadi 50, artinya, omset pada akun harus setara dengan bonus x50 dan jumlah penarikan maksimum tidak boleh melampaui jumlah bonus tanpa deposit yang telah ditambahkan. Hadiah uang tunai yang dimenangkan dalam kontes gratis dari perusahaan dianggap sebagai bonus dan siap untuk ditarik setelah mencapai omset x40.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-content-b: Misalnya: Saat melakukan deposit, Anda memperoleh $150 sebagai bonus. Menurut aturan, Anda harus mencapai nilai total opsi yang dibeli senilai 30 x 150 = $4.500. Setelah nilai ini tercapai, Anda dapat menarik dana bonus. Dalam hal ini, transaksi yang menguntungkan dan tidak menguntungkan akan diperhitungkan. Transaksi yang dihentikan sebelum waktunya tidak termasuk dalam omzet tersebut. Tidak ada pembatasan untuk penarikan profit.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-content-c: Jika Anda akan menarik sebagian deposit, bonus akan secara otomatis dikurangkan dari akun Anda.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-6-content-d: Jika Anda memiliki pertanyaan, hubungi layanan dukungan Binarium.
cashbox-withdrawal-info-7-header: Saya tidak dapat melakukan permintaan penarikan dana untuk akun saya. Apa yang mungkin salah?
cashbox-withdrawal-info-7-content: Pertama, periksa apakah semua informasi pribadi Anda telah terdaftar di laman profil Anda pada bagian "Profil". Sekali lagi, pastikan Anda memasukkan semua informasi dengan benar pada saat Anda mengirimkan permintaan Anda. Karakter khusus seperti +, -, / dll. tidak valid. Jika semua informasi yang dimasukkan sudah benar, tetapi tetap ada masalah, hubungi layanan dukungan pelanggan kami melalui obrolan daring atau di support@binarium.com.
deposit-info-1: Bonus adalah dana tambahan yang disediakan oleh perusahaan untuk meningkatkan potensi trading para trader
deposit-info-2: Saat melakukan deposit, jumlah uang bonus tertentu dapat dikreditkan ke akun Anda, besaran bonus tergantung pada besaran deposit Anda.
deposit-info-3: Bonus tidak membatasi jumlah dana yang Anda bisa tarik: Anda bisa menarik profit serta dana deposit Anda kapan saja. Harap diperhatikan bahwa saat menarik dana, semua dana bonus yang tidak digunakan dalam perdagangan dengan turnover x40 akan diubah ke status tidak aktif dan akan didebet dari akun Anda.
withdrawal-heading: Permintaan Anda akan diproses dalam waktu 24 jam sejak Anda mengirimkannya.
withdrawal-content: Jika permohonan diterbitkan di luar jam kerja departemen keuangan perusahaan, permohonan itu akan diproses pada hari kerja berikutnya.
withdrawal-restricted-content: Batas penarikan untuk jenis akun Anda telah terlewati
withdrawal-request-sent-extra-info: Anda dapat melacak status permintaan pada bagian "Riwayat Transaksi".
cashbox-withdrawal-info: Diperlukan waktu yang lama untuk memproses permintaan. Biasanya diperlukan waktu hingga 24 jam untuk mereviu permintaan selama jam kerja oleh departemen keuangan. Kami dengan gembira melaporkan bahwa kami tidak membekukan saldo Anda selagi Anda menunggu permintaan penarikan disetujui. Dengan begitu, Anda dapat terus melakukan trading.
what-are-trends-advice-content: Tren adalah alat trading khusus agar Anda dapat secara cepat menemukan aset dengan potensi yang menguntungkan (dengan arah harga yang jelas) dan membuka perdagangan sesuai arah tren.
not-enough-money-for-trends-detailed: Alat trading unik dari Binarium tersedia bagi pelanggan dengan saldo riil lebih dari {{@balance}}. Peluang menjanjikan:
trends-features-one: Lacak semua tren aset di pasar
trends-features-two: Membuka perdagangan secara instan sesuai dengan arah tren saat tren itu muncul
trading-room-is-empty: Tidak ada sinyal. Periksa Ruang Trading nanti.
demo-stats-banner-you-earned-on-demo: Anda telah menghasilkan uang di akun demo.
demo-stats-banner-real-account-opening-r: Buka akun riil, dan Anda akan dapat menarik pendapatan yang diperoleh
tour-slide-0-caption: Selamat datang ke platform trading Binarium
tour-slide-0-content: Peragaan singkat ini akan memperkenalkan tentang prinsip dasar trading dan antarmuka platform Binarium.
tour-slide-0-content-1: Baca dengan cermat semua kartu untuk mempelajari cara trading yang lebih efektif di platform.
tour-slide-0-content-2: Peragaan singkat ini akan memperkenalkan tentang prinsip dasar trading dan antarmuka platform Binarium.
tour-slide-0-content-3: Menu utama ada di sebelah kiri. Misalnya, Anda dapat mengisi akun Anda pada bagian Bank. Dan Anda dapat memesan perdagangan menggunakan trader terbaik di platform pada bagian Ruang trading tersebut!
tour-slide-0-content-3-port: Menu utama ada di sebelah kiri. Misalnya, Anda dapat melakukan deposit pada bagian Bank. Dan Anda dapat melakukan perdagangan dengan bantuan trader terbaik di platform pada bagian Ruang trading tersebut!
tour-slide-0-extra-info: Baca dengan cermat semua kartu untuk mempelajari cara trading yang lebih efektif di platform.
tour-slide-1-caption: Bagaimana cara menghasilkan uang di platform?
tour-slide-1-content: Platform trading memungkinkan Anda melakukan trading dengan membuat investasi jangka pendek pada aset keuangan: pasangan kurs valuta asing, mata uang kripto, komoditas, dan instrumen keuangan lainnya.
tour-slide-2-caption: Apa prinsip dasar di balik trading?
tour-slide-2-content-a: Perdagangan adalah suatu prediksi tentang bagaimana harga suatu aset keuangan akan berubah selama jangka waktu tertentu. Investor melakukan perdagangan jangka panjang maupun jangka pendek.
tour-slide-2-content-b: Jika prediksi Anda ternyata benar, Anda akan menerima pendapatan. Jika prediksi Anda salah, maka Anda akan kehilangan semua dana yang Anda investasikan.
tour-slide-3-caption: Bagaimana cara melakukan trading di platform Binarium?
tour-slide-3-content: Pilih aset yang ingin Anda ramalkan tren harganya.
tour-slide-4-caption: Bagaimana cara melakukan trading di platform Binarium?
tour-slide-5-caption: Bagaimana cara melakukan trading di platform Binarium?
tour-slide-5-content: Buka perdagangan setelah Anda membuat prediksi bahwa harga akannaik atau turun. Tunggu sampai trading ditutup.
tour-slide-6-caption: Semoga sukses dalam trading di platform Binarium
tour-slide-6-additional-caption: Jika prediksi Anda benar, profit akan otomatis dikreditkan pada akun trading Anda.
tour-slide-6-a-card-0-caption: Jumlah pendapatan yang akan Anda terima dari keberhasilan ramalan yang Anda lakukan:
tour-slide-6-a-card-0-content-2: dari jumlah investasi yang Anda akan terima dari pembuatan prediksi yang berhasil.
tour-slide-6-a-card-2-caption: waktu rata-rata yang diperlukan untuk menarik dana:
tour-slide-6-a-card-3-caption: Deposit dana ke akun riil untuk mulai trading:
tour-slide-6-b-card-0-caption: Jumlah pendapatan yang akan Anda terima dari keberhasilan ramalan yang Anda lakukan:
tour-slide-6-b-card-2-caption: waktu rata-rata yang diperlukan untuk menarik dana.
tour-slide-6-b-card-3-caption: Pelajari cara trading tanpa risiko menggunakan akun demo
what-is-trading-room-advice-content: Ruang trading adalah suatu alat praktis yang memungkinkan Anda menyalin transaksi dari para trader terbaik di platform dengan sekali klik. Berkat alat ini, Anda dapat meningkatkan efisiensi perdagangan dan menghemat waktu.
not-enough-money-for-trading-room-detail: Trading dan hasilkan uang dengan para trader terbaik di platform Binarium menggunakan ruang trading. Isi saldo riil Anda sebesar {{@minBalance}} dan dapatkan manfaat berikut:
have-access-to-trading-room: Untuk mendapatkan akses ke "Ruang Trading", hubungi manajer Anda atau layanan dukungan.
trading-room-features-one: Perhatikan transaksi-transaksi dari trader paling sukses di platform tersebut
trading-room_1-text: Perhatikan transaksi-transaksi dari trader paling sukses di platform tersebut.
trading-room_2-text: Tiru perilaku trader lain dan hasilkan profit!
trading-room_refill: Untuk mengakses "Ruang Trading", isi ulang saldo Anda pada
modal-confirm_text-1: Tautan konfirmasi ada di dalam pesan yang Anda terima setelah pendaftaran.
modal-confirm_text-2: Apakah Anda tidak menerima pesan dengan tautan konfirmasi? Periksa folder "Spam" Anda. Kadang kala, pesan tersesat ke sana. Atau minta dikirim pesan lagi.
modal-confirm_error-1-1: Surel baru dapat dikirimkan kepada Anda dalam {@time}} menit. Untuk mengaktifkan akun Anda, periksa surel Anda atau hubungi layanan dukungan kami atau
modal-oneclick_text: Harap perhatikan bahwa Anda dapat membuka perdagangan di platform hanya dengan sekali klik. Tidak ada konfirmasi tambahan.
modal-tbalance_text: Dana di akun Anda tidak mencukupi. Isi ulang dana di akun Anda untuk mengikuti kontes.
modal-tech_text-1: Kami terus berupaya untuk memperbaiki platform trading kami. Saat ini, kami sedang melakukan pembaruan. Kami mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang mungkin kami timbulkan.
modal-session_text-1: Pasar saham tutup pada akhir pekan.
modal-session_text-3: antara pukul 03.00 pada hari Senin hingga pukul 00.00 pada hari Jumat.
modal-session_text-4: Sesi trading Anda akan dimulai dalam:
modal-tn_text-1: Trader dengan saldo terbanyak pada akhir kontes akan menjadi pemenang.
modal-nickname_text: Untuk ikuti dalam kontes, masukkan nama panggilan yang mereprentasikan Anda pada daftar peserta kontes. Anda dapat mengubahnya di pengaturan profil kapan saja.
modal-profile_text: Berikan informasi tambahan untuk terus bekerja di platform.
faq_group-0-a-0:
Fill out the registration form on the main page. Check your email and confirm your email address by clicking the link we've sent you.

Registration is absolutely free. Fund your account when you're ready to make a real profit. Practice with our demo account before making a deposit.

You're all set to trade once your account is registered. No documentation is needed. All it takes is to accept the Client Agreement in the registration form.
faq_group-0-a-1:
Make your first steps in professional trading easy and risk-free. Get full access to all the platform features with Binarium Demo account. Once your account is set up, practice your trading skills and test your trading strategies with $1,000 on your Demo account. Feel free to switch between Real and Demo accounts in the terminal. On the Demo account you don't deal with the real money and won't be able to withdraw profit.

If you ran out of demo funds, sign out and log in to your account to restore the initial balance.
faq_group-0-a-2: The minimum deposit is $5, €5, A$5, ₽300 or ₴150. Your first investment brings real profit closer.
faq_group-0-a-3:
Build your trading confidence and knowledge with the Education section. Our free materials will help you trade smart and find out more about key strategies and assets offered by Binarium.

We provide one-on-one training classes with our best traders. Contact us to learn more.
faq_group-0-a-4: Binarium is only available for persons who have come of legal age.
faq_group-0-a-5: Access Binarium from any device using a mobile browser or install the Android app on your phone.
faq_group-0-q-6: Still have questions? Get in touch with us
faq_group-0-a-6: Get help from our online customer support chat or email us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
faq_group-1-a-0: Trade is a financial instrument that provides a fixed payout if the prediction of the asset price at the expiry time is correct. Place trades based on whether you believe the price of the asset will be higher or lower than the initial. All you need to do is to choose an asset and predict its price dynamics for a selected period. If the trade is successful, you earn the fixed payout (in-the-money). If at the end of the trade the asset price remains at the same level, your investment is credited back to your account with no profit. If the asset's dynamics were predicted incorrectly, you lose the amount of your investment (out-of-the-money), yet without risking all of your capital.
faq_group-1-a-1:
Expiry time determines the moment when the trade is over and you find out if you made a profit.

Binarium offers two types of trades: short-term trades with an expiration time of no more than 5 minutes and trades that last from 5 minutes to 3 months.
faq_group-1-a-2: The expiry rate is the value of the financial asset at the moment of trade expiration. It may be lower, higher or equal to the opening price. The compliance between the expiry rate and the trader's prediction defines the profit.
faq_group-1-a-3: When you predict a Put or High option, you assume that the value of the asset compared to the opening price will fall. A Call or Low option means that you suppose the value of an asset will rise.
faq_group-1-a-4:
Quote relates to the price of an asset at a particular moment. For you as a trader quotes at the trade start (opening price) and end (expiry rate) are particularly important.

Binarium quotes are provided by Leverate, a company with a sound reputation of the market leader.
faq_group-1-a-5: The asset price at the moment of trade opening.
faq_group-1-q-6: Still have questions? Get in touch with us
faq_group-1-a-6: Get help from our online customer support chat or email us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
faq_group-2-a-0: We offer 5 currencies to choose from: US Dollar, Euro, Australian Dollar, Russian Ruble and Ukrainian Hryvnia. Please note, that it's impossible to change your account currency after the registration.
faq_group-2-a-1: Make deposits and withdraw payouts with your VISA, Mastercard and Mir credit cards, Qiwi, Yandex.Money and WebMoney e-wallets. We also accept Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin and Ripple cryptocurrencies.
faq_group-2-a-2: $5, €5, A$5, ₽300 or ₴150. This amount allows you to start trading and make real profits.
faq_group-2-a-3: The maximum amount you can deposit in a single transaction is $10,000, €10,000, A$10,000, ₽600,000 or ₴250,000. There is no limit to the number of top up transactions.
faq_group-2-q-4: When will my money reach my Binarium account?
faq_group-2-a-4: Your deposit is reflected in your account as soon as you confirm the payment. The money on the bank account is reserved, and then immediately displayed on the platform and in your Binarium account.
faq_group-2-q-5: My payment was declined. What should I do?
faq_group-2-a-5: Various factors could result in this issue. Please email us at support@binarium.com or contact our Customer support team via online chat with as many details as you can about the issue. We'll try to resolve it as soon as we can.
faq_group-2-a-6:
Your account type is determined by the total of deposits and the real trading volume. Upgrade your account by topping up and being active on the platform. We don't charge fees for keeping your account type. It stays with you for unlimited time.

Find out more in the Account types section.
faq_group-2-q-7: Still have questions? Get in touch with us
faq_group-2-a-7: Get help from our online customer support chat or email us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
faq_group-3-a-0: The minimum you can withdraw is $5, €5, A$5, ₽300 or ₴150.
faq_group-3-a-1:
$250, €250, A$250, ₽15,000 or ₴6,000 per transaction. These limits guarantee that you receive your money as quickly as possible.

To withdraw a higher amount, divide it into several transactions. Your account type determines the possible number of transactions (detailed descriptions are available in the Account types section).

Learn more about withdrawing larger amounts from our Support team.
faq_group-3-a-2:
More than this. We cover your payment system fees when you top up your account or withdraw funds.

However, if your trading volume (the sum of all your trades) isn't at least twice as big as your deposit, we may not cover the 10% fee of the requested withdrawal amount.
faq_group-3-q-3: It takes 1 hour to process withdrawal request
faq_group-3-a-3:
If your account is fully verified and meets all the platform requirements, we'll be able to process your withdrawal request within one hour.

In case your account hasn't been verified, the withdrawal request will take up to three business days to process. Binarium accepts no more than one request per day from an unverified account.

Please note, we only process requests during the financial department's operating hours (09:00–22:00 (GMT +3) Monday to Friday). We also process a limited number of requests on weekends. If you've submitted an application when the financial department was closed, it will be processed at the beginning of the next business day.
faq_group-3-a-4:
Binarium cares about your security. That's why verification is mandatory for submitting a withdrawal request. It is a guarantee that your funds won't become fraud or money laundering target.

We transfer money only to the bank accounts that were previously used to fund your Binarium account. In the event that the original funding account is no longer available or you topped up your account with several payment methods, please, contact our Customer support team via online chat or email us at support@binarium.com with a detailed description of the issue.
faq_group-3-a-5:
To get verified we ask you to complete all the fields in the User Profile section (personal information and contacts) and email the documents listed below to id@binarium.com.

For accounts topped up with VISA, Mastercard and Maestro cards:

  • Bank card scans or high-resolution photos (both sides). Image requirements:
    • the first 6 and the last 4 digits of the card number are clearly visible (for example, 530403XXXXXX1111); the numbers in the middle must be hidden;
    • the card holder first and last names are clearly visible;
    • the expiration date is clearly visible;
    • the card holder signature is clearly visible;
    • the CVV code must be hidden.
  • Card holder's passport scan or high-quality photograph of the pages showing personal data, period of validity, country of issue, signature and photo.
  • Official statement issued by your bank showing the top-up payment to Binarium (digital statements from the bank mobile app are not accepted).

For Qiwi, Webmoney and Yandex.Money e-wallets and Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin and Ripple cryptocurrency wallets owners:

  • Card holder's passport scan or high-quality photograph of the pages showing personal data, period of validity, country of issue, signature and photo.
  • Document or screenshot from the e-wallet showing the top-up payment to Binarium; this document should also reflect all the transactions during the month in which the deposit was made.

Please do not hide or edit any part of scans and photographs except those indicated above.

Third-party funding and withdrawals are prohibited.
faq_group-3-q-6: I can't submit a withdrawal request
faq_group-3-a-6:
Check if you completed all the fields in your profile. To check, go to Profile settings. If the entered data is incorrect or incomplete, the request may be rejected or processing delayed. Make sure you've entered your account information or wallet number correctly (the symbols +, *, /, () and spaces before, after and in the middle are prohibited).

If all the information is entered correctly but the problem still persists, contact our Support team via the online chat or message the online chat with a description of the issue.
faq_group-3-q-7: My withdrawal request is approved, but I haven't received the money yet
faq_group-3-a-7:
Transfers take different amounts of time depending on your payment method.

In case of withdrawal to bank cards the process consists of several stages, and the transaction processing time depends on the issuing bank. It can take up to several business days for the money to reach a bank card. Contact your bank to learn the details.

Funds are credited to e-wallets within one hour after the request has been approved by the Binarium financial department.

One of the possible reasons for a delay are unforeseen circumstances. These include technical problems in the processing center and e-wallet system failures.

If this is the case, please be patient, as the circumstances are beyond our control. If the funds haven't been credited to your card or wallet within the specified time, please contact our Support team for assistance.
faq_group-3-q-8: Still have questions? Get in touch with us
faq_group-3-a-8: Get help from our online customer support chat or email us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
faq_group-4-a-0:
Bonuses are funds you receive in addition to your deposit to increase your trading potential. The bonus amount depends on your deposit amount and account status. Bonuses are credited to a separate bonus account.

We offer the following types of bonuses:

  • a welcome bonus for new clients for making their first deposit
  • bonuses for participating in company promos
  • risk-free trades and deposit insurance (more detailed information about these bonus types available below)
  • prize bonuses received from free Binarium tournaments (the prize fund is distributed among participants depending on place taken)

The conditions for receiving a bonus and its size are individual in each case. The company has the right to revoke issued bonuses if you violate any provisions of the Client Agreement.

If multiple deposits were made due to payment system restrictions, contact Support to receive a bonus for the total deposit amount.

You can decline a bonus when making a deposit.
faq_group-4-a-1:
You can open risk-free trades without the risk of losing your deposit. When you open a risk-free trade, no funds are debited from your balance, and any profit is credited to your bonus account.

Risk-free trades are accrued when making deposits to your account using promo codes and as part of special offers. The number and size of risk-free trades is indicated in the promo or promo code description. You can open risk-free trades at any time, but they will be voided if you withdraw funds.

Your available risk-free trades are displayed on the terminal to the right above the green Higher button.

How do they work?

An amount equal to the total amount of the risk-free trade (shown in the promo or promo code description) is reserved from your real account and credited to your bonus account.

For example, you deposit $100 to your account and receive three $10 risk-free trades. Therefore, $30 is reserved from your real balance and credited to your bonus account. You can use this $30 to open three risk-free trades in a row with possible losses compensated by the platform. Total compensation from the platform can't exceed the deposit amount.

The terms and conditions for processing bonus funds from risk-free trades are similar to the terms and conditions for regular bonuses.
faq_group-4-a-2:
Deposit insurance is a type of bonuses offered by Binarium. We'll cover possible losses for a specific number of your trades.

Deposit insurance rules:

  • only the first consecutive trades are insured;
  • the investment in one trade cannot exceed 33% of the total deposit;
  • the amount of compensation from the platform cannot exceed the deposit amount.

For instance, a trader received five insured trades, and after they were closed the account balance was less than before the trades. According to the rules, the platform compensates the difference. In this event the funds credited as compensation are considered bonus funds and the rules applied to them are similar to the ones for the regular bonuses.

If the terms and conditions on which the insurance is provided are met, contact the Customer support team to receive your compensation.
faq_group-4-a-3:
Bonus funds, including funds earned using bonuses and in free tournaments, are only available for withdrawal after you reach the required trade volume. Bonus funds can't be withdrawn immediately after you've received them.

To withdraw deposit bonuses (bonuses received for topping up Binarium account), your bonus funds must be turned over 40 times prior to withdrawal.

For example, you make topped up your account and received a $150 bonus. Your total trade volume must reach: $150×40=$6,000. Once your trade volume reaches this amount, the bonus funds can be withdrawn.

Bonus funds must be turned over 50 times for no deposit bonuses. The maximum withdrawal amount cannot exceed the amount of the received no deposit bonus.

Total turnover includes both profitable and losing trades. Trades closed at the opening price are not recognized in the turnover. There are no limits on profit withdrawal. However, the bonus is automatically removed from your account if you withdraw a part of the deposit that granted the bonus.

Please note that the Martingale strategy (doubling up trade investments) is prohibited on Binarium. Martingale-applied trades are detected by the platform and are not recognized in the turnover. Moreover, the results of these trades can be considered non-valid and be rejected by the company.

Up to 5% of the bonus total is considered in the turnover per one trade. For example, you received a $200 bonus, which means the maximum amount that will be considered in the bonus turnover necessary for withdrawal cannot exceed $10 per trade.
faq_group-4-q-4: Still have questions? Get in touch with us
faq_group-4-a-4: Get help from our online customer support chat or email us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
faq_group-5-a-0: $10,000, €10,000, A$10,000, ₽600,000 or ₴250,000. The number of active trades with maximum investment is limited to 20.
faq_group-5-a-1: The amount of investments in one trade can't be less than $1, €1, A$1, ₽60 or ₴25.
faq_group-5-q-2: How do I open a trade?
faq_group-5-a-2:
Select an asset, expiration time and investment amount. Then decide on the price dynamics. If you expect the value of the asset to increase, click the green Call button. To bet on the price decrease, click the red Put button.

Please note that on Binarium systematic use of the Martingale strategy (doubling up trade size) is strictly prohibited. Violations of this rule may result in the trades deemed as invalid and your account blocked.
faq_group-5-a-3: Review your trades in the History section. Access it either from the left menu of the terminal or the dropdown menu in the upper right corner by clicking on the user profile and selecting the Trading history section.
faq_group-5-a-4: Up to 90% on Binarium. Represents the percentage of investment that the trader gets after a trade expires in-the-money.
faq_group-5-q-5: How can I monitor my active trades?
faq_group-5-a-5: Trade progress is displayed in the asset chart and the History section (in the left menu). The platform allows you to work with 4 charts at once.
faq_group-5-q-6: What days of the week trading is available on Binarium?
faq_group-5-a-6: All Binarium assets are available from Monday to Friday. Trade cryptocurrency, OTC assets, LATAM and GSMI indices during the weekend on Saturdays and Sundays.
faq_group-5-a-7: Find trading hours for every Binarium asset in the Asset catalogue section.
faq_group-5-a-8:
Full trade details are stored in the Binraium system. Asset type, opening and closing price, trade opening and expiry time (accurate to one second) are recorded for every opened trade.

In the event of any doubts about the accuracy of quotes, contact Binarium Customer support team with a request to investigate the case and compare quotes with their supplier. The request processing takes at least three business days.
faq_group-5-q-9: Why Binarium quotes are different from those on FOREX and other sources?
faq_group-5-a-9:
Possible reasons include:

  • quotes from different sources may vary slightly;
  • FOREX quotes are displayed as Bid (demand price) and Ask (offer price); Binarium displays the average quote, which is calculated as (Bid+Ask)÷2;
  • a minor difference in the time when quotes are received may cause them to differ in the 4th-5th decimal places.

When registering, you accept that Binarium quotes have priority. They may not coincide with quotations from other resources. Third-party resources can only be considered as auxiliary tools and cannot be used to verify quotes.
faq_group-5-q-10: Still have questions? Get in touch with us
faq_group-5-a-10: Get help from our online customer support chat or email us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
modal-bonus@text: The trade size exceeds your available real funds. So in opening the transaction, your bonus funds will be used:
modal-bonus@info: All funds received as part of the trade will be credited to your bonus account.
trends@restrict-text: To unlock the Trends section, your account balance must be at least
confirm-trade@timer: Jendela menutup secara otomatis dalam {{@data}} d
confirm-trade@heading: Bagus! Anda akan mengonfirmasi trading. Periksa detailnya berikut ini:
tr-empty@text: Geluti dunia trading secara mendalam bersama para profesional. Tiru perdagangan dari para trader paling sukses di platform dan hasilkan lebih banyak uang.
tr-empty@business: Ruang trading terbuka bagi trader dengan akun Bisnis dan di atasnya. Dua sesi trading 4-jam pada hari kerja. Sekitar 30 sinyal dari para trader profesional setiap hari. Jangan sia-siakan waktu Anda guna mempelajari segala sesuatunya secara mandiri — trader terbaik di Binarium telah membereskan pekerjaan untuk Anda.
tr-empty@vip: Para klien VIP kami mendapatkan semua hak istimewa ruang trading, termasuk sinyal pribadi dan kerja sama secara individu dengan trader perusahaan yang akan menjawab semua pertanyaan Anda, menjelaskan tren pasar saat ini dan menyarankan bidang-bidang yang berpotensi tinggi. Ini adalah cara terbaik untuk medapatkan hasil yang terbaik dari trading.
ac-types@label_openDealsSum: Jumlah trading terbuka maksimum (dalam satu waktu)
ac-types@tradeback-hint: Tradeback — pengembalian sebagian dana dari perdagangan trader yang kalah. Dikreditkan setiap hari Kamis pukul 12.00 (0.00 UTC)
video-tutorial@title: Cara memulai trading di Binarium dalam 90 detik
withdrawal@limit-with-counter:
Batas penarikan dana telah terlampaui.
Jenis akun Anda mengizinkan {{@limitCount}} permintaan yang totalnya {{@limitAmount}}.
Anda dapat membuat permintaan lain dalam {{@limitTime}}.
